Text:
Please be aware that I've got my upload pipe maxed out at 35kbps and I've got nothing else running, so please be patient, I'm seeding as fast as I can.

Enjoy!  :)

Low audio volume and static in the background.
Corrupt audio in the prologue, maybe other files as well. Could be a download error but I doubt it.

A million thanks to the up-loader for the effort, but I'm going to look for a better copy.
